name: Obsticastle
description:
Obsticastle

One player is the platformer and the other is the dungeon, but there's only one controller so you better learn to share.

It's played with a single controller and is two-player. First player holds the left side of the controller whereas the second player holds the right side of the controller. The platformer's goal is to move right. The dungeon's goal is to stop the platformer and make them rage quit.

Play on your own for a diminshed challenge!

[Controller required to play]

Created by some of Falling Cat Studios in 48 hours as part of the Fall 2015 UW-Stout IGDA Club 48 Hour Game Jam, Breaking the Fourth Wall.:

Bob Vogt - Programming

April Jane - Art, Music, and SFX

Bronson Bero - Art

Shane Yach - Programming
